fn.p: Funding. DC was supported by a doctoral fellowship from the Shiv Nadar University. RP Lab was supported by the CSIR-EMR grant and start-up funds from the Shiv Nadar University. FC Lab was supported by the Knut and Alice Wallenberg Foundation (KAW), the Laboratory of Molecular Infection Medicine Sweden (MIMS), the Swedish Research Council, and the Kempe Foundation.
